explanation: There were two errors in the xml. The first one was an incorrect attribute assignment in the AUTHOR tag. The correct format is <AUTHOR>Wolf</AUTHOR>, not <AUTHOR=Wolf</AUTHOR>. The second error was in the last BIBL tag, where the closing tag of PRIZE was written as PRICE. The correct format is <PRIZE>30 Btz.</PRIZE>, not <PRICE>30 Btz.</PRICE>.
